CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 21, 1949, pg. 15 reads: "Holy Cross Fashion Show...which will star June Eckstine of New York will have as additional models Mary Baltimore, seated; Martha Thomas, Helen Mull, Betty Hord and Vonda Burwell. The affair will take place at Schenley High School, Thursday night, May 26.  A delightful musical program will be featured as well as tiny tots' fashion parade. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Fashion models Mary Baltimore, seated; Betty Hord, unknown woman, and Martha Thomas, standing on stage, in interior, possibly Holy Cross Church, preparing for fashion show
